arguments.name: whitelist
arguments.description: Array of data fields to pick (possible values: 'nationality', 'zodiac', 'aliases', 'height', 'weight', 'avatar', 'bornOn', 'labels', 'hair color', 'eye color', 'ethnicity', 'birthplace', 'measurements', 'tattoos', 'piercings', 'career')

arguments.name: blacklist
arguments.description: Array of data fields to omit (for values see whitelist)

arguments.name: searchResultsSort
arguments.description: Specify the search result sort order key to use. Advanced setting: use only if you know what you are doing. Possible values are 'relevance', 'rank.currentRank', 'followerCount', 'profileCompleted' or 'views'

arguments.name: useImperial
arguments.description: Use imperial units for height and weight

arguments.name: useAvatarAsThumbnail
arguments.description: Use the discovered Actor Avatar as the Actor Thumbnail image

arguments.name: piercingsType
arguments.description: How to return the piercings. Use 'array' if your custom field is a select or multi select

arguments.name: tattoosType
arguments.description: How to return the tattoos. Use 'array' if your custom field is a select or multi select
